type.description:
Type of message to send

- text: Normal text only message with the associated format

- webhook: Use a Discord webhook to have the bot use the player's username and avatar when sending messages. Requires a webhook URL to be set. Ignores the message format, and just sends the message as the content of the webhook

- embed: Discord embed with the format as the description field

embed_color.description:
Color of the embed in #RRGGBB format

Can be disabled with false or ""

channel.description:
Override channel for these messages

Can be disabled with false or ""

activity_text.description:
Activity text of the bot to show in Discord

Placeholders available: {amount}

update_channel_topic_interval.description:
Set the interval (in minutes) for updating the channel topic

Use a value of 0 to disable

format.description:
Format for the channel topic

Placeholders available:

{players} - Total number of players online

{player_list} - List of players (format is defined below)

{servers} - Number of servers

{server_list} - List of server names

{hostname} - Server hostname

{port} - Server port

{motd} - Message of the Day (MOTD)

{query_port} - Query port

{max_players} - Maximum number of players

{plugins} - Number of plugins

{plugin_list} - List of plugin names

{version} - Server version

{software} - Software name

{average_ping} - Average ping of all players

{uptime} - Server uptime in hours and minutes

{server[SERVERNAME]} - Dynamic placeholder for each server's name and status (e.g., {server[MyServer]}, {server[AnotherServer]}, {server[Lobby]}, etc.)

player_list_header.description:
Header for the player list

Can be disabled with "" or false to hide the header and only show the player list

player_list_max_count.description: Maximum amount of players to show in the player list

player_list_no_players_header.description:
Header for when no players are online

Can be disabled with "" or false to hide the list completely when no players are online

player_list_player.description:
Format for each player in the player list

Placeholders available: {username}, {ping}

player_list_separator.description:
Separator between players in the player list

\n can be used for new line

server.description:
Template for server[SERVERNAME] placeholder in the channel topic

Placeholders available: {name}, {players}, {max_players}, {motd}, {version}, {protocol}

ephemeral.description: Ephemeral messages are only visible to the user who sent the command

codeblock_lang.description: Language for the codeblock formatting in Discord

format.description:
Format for proxy start messages

Can be disabled with false or ""

Format for proxy stop messages

Can be disabled with false or ""

channel.description: Channel ID to send Minecraft chat messages to

show_bot_messages.description: Show messages from bots in Minecraft chat

show_attachments_ingame.description: Show clickable links for attachments in Minecraft chat

enable_mentions.description: Enable mentioning Discord users from Minecraft chat

enable_everyone_and_here.description: Enable @everyone and @here pings from Minecraft chat

webhook_url.description: Full webhook URL to send more fancy Minecraft chat messages to

avatar_url.description:
Full URL of an avatar service to get the player's avatar from

Placeholders available: {uuid}, {username}

webhook_username.description:
The format of the webhook's username

Placeholders available: {username}, {server}

no_players.description: Message to show when no players are online

player_format.description: Format for each player in the list

server_format.description: Format for each server in the list

server_offline.description: Message to show when a server is offline

show_bot_messages.description: Show messages from bots in Minecraft chat

show_attachments_ingame.description: Show clickable links for attachments in Minecraft chat

username_chunk.description:
Format for username part of messages

Uses MiniMessage format

Placeholders available: {role_color}, {display_name}, {username}, {nickname}
<insert> tag allows you to shift right-click the username to insert @{username} in the chat

links.description:
Format for links in chat messages

Uses MiniMessage format

Placeholders available: {url}, {link_color}

Can be disabled with "" or false

discord_color.description: Color for Discord tag in MiniMessage format

attachment_color.description: Color for attachment links in MiniMessage format

role_prefixes.description: Role prefixes for Discord users using MiniMessage format Example format: "123456789" = "[OWNER]"

$schema.description: URL to the JSON schema file

exclude_servers.description: Comma separated list of server names to exclude from the bridge (defined under [servers] inside your velocity.toml)

excluded_servers_receive_messages.description: Whether excluded servers should receive messages from discord

ping_interval.description:
How often to ping all servers to check for online status (seconds)

Excluded servers will not be pinged

Use a value of 0 to disable

server_names.description:
Server display names

If a server is not found in this list, the server name (from velocity.toml) will be used instead

minecraft.description:
Discord > Minecraft message formats

Uses XML-like formatting with https://docs.advntr.dev/minimessage/format.html

unevaluatedProperties.description: Configuration override for a specific server
